name: Cold Dead Hands
description:
This is it: your last stand. You prepare to leave the abandoned ski resort atop a snowy mountain. You grab your snowboard, your rifle, and as much ammo as you can carry, and you set out to take out as many zombies as you can before being overtaken by the hordes of the undead. How long can you survive?

Cold Dead Hands is a "2D Infinite Runner-Shooter" where you, the player, have to survive as long as possible while shooting, crushing, and dodging zombies along the way. Try to get the highest score you can, and post your score to the leaderboard to see if your score is one of the best around the world!
